Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.5
Entries.Description: Do you want stay updated? Follow one of the app communities Facebook or Twitter!
Messages: Fixed asking to enable GPS before obtaining necessary permissions.
Fixed crash when checking for updates on Samsung Galaxy S9+.
Changed upload result notification to be single line.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.4
Entries.Description: Do you want stay updated? Follow one of the app communities Facebook or Twitter!
Messages: Attempt to fix failing export to GPX.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.3
Messages: Changed DB schema to optimize performance and reduce battery usage.
Fixed crash when checking for GPS availability was denied on API lower than 21.
Fixed toast messages displayed incorrectly when importing and exporting preferences.
Added monitoring of airplane mode for changes.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.2
Entries.Description: Tower Collector now supports Mozilla Location Services project! Share your feedback via Google+ and Facebook communities, email or GitHub issues.
Messages: Fixed 'no data to upload' reported when one of the projects was failing and re-upload enabled.
Improved upload to OpenCellID on faulty devices.
Added shortcuts to start/stop collector and upload directly from launcher on Android 7.1 and newer.
Added warning if battery optimizations are enabled which may influence reliability of collected measurements.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.1
Entries.Description: Tower Collector now supports Mozilla Location Services project! Share your feedback via Google+ and Facebook communities, email or GitHub issues.
Messages: Fix secure upload error on Android Lollipop 5.0 and older.
